article.headline: Chattanooga 65, MVSU 61
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- Nicchaeus Doaks scored 21 points, grabbed six rebounds and blocked three shots to lead Chattanooga to a 65-61 win over Mississippi Valley State on Saturday night. After playing to a 32-32 tie at halftime, the Mocs (2-7) shot 55.6 percent from the field (10 of 18) and were 3 of 6 from 3-point range in the second half. Stephen McDowell added 19 points for Chattanooga, Ty Patterson scored 14 and Khalil Hartwell contributed 10 rebounds and two blocks. Michael Clark led the Delta Devils (0-13) with 17 points and Shannon Behling added 16. Chattanooga, which snapped a two-game losing streak, was 23 of 30 from the free-throw line.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
